Given a DefId, ty::Const, etc., is it possible to find out if a &[u8] const was originally a byte string? Ideally, this would work even without access to the HIR (in case the crate is being loaded from metadata).

This is just for cosmetic reasons, so I could approximate this by checking if the source snippet starts with b", but I'd really like to avoid that if possible since it's very hacky.
